attributes.action: Get the electricities company`s to use the pylons as a meansd to create free power
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we have millions of pylons all over th country, these should be used to get power from either wind, rain or solar, and given free to locals.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Wind-Turbines/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
